channel.title: scripts on Evi1haxor

item.title: CoVup Setu
item.description: Because services that have setu in their names are rad’ cool. Github/CoVup repository 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 ├── meta.json ├── README.md ├── scripts │ ├── main.py └── templates ├── announce.txt └── subscribers.txt I have made such arrangements (using WayScript) that the script scripts/main.py would trigger itself off every day and send an email to all the subscribers regarding the latest CoV pandemic stats about their district (like active cases, confirmed cases, recovered cases and deceased cases).
